p: Construction of Calibration Curve. A stock solution of 2 mg/ml of eugenol standard solution was prepared in methanol. Working solutions were prepared by diluting the stock solution with the same solvent to obtain 5, 10, 25, 50, 75, and 100 ug /ml. Each concentration was prepared with three replicates and injected into the HPLC system. The amount of O. gratissimum oil corresponding to the eugenol content was calculated by using eugenol peak area and the concentration of eugenol based on the calibration curve.
